summary: Calculate basic statistics about the reference sequence itself

arguments.summary: An output file created by the walker.  Will overwrite contents if file exists
arguments.name: --out

description:
These are very basic statistics: total number of bases and number of "regular" bases (i.e. A, C, T or G).

Input

A FASTA reference file.

Output

Base counts are written to file if an output file name is given (with -o), otherwise output to stdout.

Usage example

 java -jar GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
   -T FastaStats \
   -R reference.fasta \
   [-o output.txt]
name: FastaStats
